title: Can anyone tell which is the background song in this video? - Quora

response.answer_text: There isn't any song like that. It is an advertisement jingle made for Nissan Ignite commercial. Big brands have their own jingles to promote their brand. For example, you might be familiar with Nokia, Airtel, Reliance, Sony Walkman, Mountain Dew commercial jingles. This is one such instance.
